roleset.name: giving (in)

roles.note: The verb frame combines the acquiescing and giving senses, and they take similar syntax, so I have left them combined here as well.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: And this faith is a lively faith, and worketh in man a ready submission of his will to God's will.

example.name: args 0, 1, 2
example.text: ...his submission of paperwork to the EEOC in January 2007 constitutes the "filing" of an EEOC charge...

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, submit.01. Corresponds to VNcls acquiesce-95, contribute-13.2-1-1.
